tracks.text: His eyes dart around
He swallows
Katy Perry frowns
The wedding guests look around. The flower girl furrows her brow
Katy Perry rolls here eyes
The bridesmaids, groomsmen, and priest bounce to the beat.
She puts her hands on her hips
She pokes him in the chest with her bouquet
The groom runs out of the church
Perry runs after him. The wedding party dance
The groom runs down the street and looks behind him. Perry chases after him, in her wedding dress.
The groom runs into a man in a hotdog costume flirting with girls. They fall to the ground.
Perry tears the pink train off her wedding dress, leaving it as only a white jumper with giant bows.
Girls abandon their bike to help the hotdog man on the ground. Perry steals their bike.
The groom knocks over a watermelon, which Perry struggles to bike around.
The groom darts into an alleyway, where he's pulled into a club bathed in red light.
The groom is picked up by the crowd and carried to a concert stage.
Katy Perry performs in a red leather jacket, Diesel sunglasses, and a black pencil skirt.
The groom fights his way through the crowd, away from the stage
The groom makes it back to the alley way, only to find Perry and 6 other brides surrounding an expensive car. The other brides carry baseball bats.
Perry and the brides all have runny mascara and eyeline. Many are dirty and disheveled.
The brides dance with the baseball bats.
The brides walk aggressively to the groom and surround him.
Perry stands in front of the groom while the brides walk in a circle
The groom runs away.
The groom runs straight down a warehouse. Perry and the brides ride pink bicycles, chasing after him.
The groom tries to hide around a corner. He looks down pulls out a Nokia phone.
He slides up the Nokia's screen, and Perry sings to him while crying.
The groom runs around a corner, then stops short.
Perry, wearing lime green eye shadow, stands in the center of a dozen dancers. They all wear urban clothes and dance.
A yellow tube man blows behind them
The groom turns around. Behind him is Perry and the angry brides.
In front, the urban dancers
To his left, girls hula hoop and ride around on roller skates.
To his right, Perry sings in the club.
Behind him, the brides brandish bats
In front, breakdancing
Perry mimes crotch thrusting and spanking
The breakdancers form a wall. The brides form a wall. The groom steps back and trips over a boom box.
The breakdancers surround him. The groom looks up, and Perry walks up to him, leading a zebra.
The groom closes his eyes and opens them. Back at the wedding, Perry stares at him expectantly.
Everyone looks at the groom
The audience leans forward
The bridesmaids sigh. Perry and the priest look relieved.
The Man of Honor dances with a chihuahua
Perry and the groom run down the aisle, hand in hand
